description: Gets an array of network connectivity configurations.

page_token.description: Pagination token to go to next page based on previous query.

account_id.description: The Databricks account ID that hosts the credential.

\"my-example-ncc\".description: The name must match the regular expression

region.description: The region for the network connectivity configuration. Only workspaces in the same region can be attached to the network connectivity configuration.

egress_config.description: The network connectivity rules that apply to network traffic from your serverless compute resources.

1691436121706.description: Time in epoch milliseconds when this object was created.

next_page_token.description: A token that can be used to get the next page of results. If null, there are no more results to show.
